com.netflix.nicobar.core.module

Class GraphUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.nicobar.core.module.GraphUtils

  • public class GraphUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for managing graphs. Leverages the JGraphT library.

      • swapVertices

        public static <V> void swapVertices(org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<V,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> graph,
                    java.util.Map<V,java.util.Set<V>> alternates)
        replace the vertices in the graph with an alternate set of vertices.
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to be mutated
        alternates - alternate vertices to insert into the graph. map of vertices to their direct dependents.

      • addAllVertices

        public static <V> void addAllVertices(org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<V,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> graph,
                      java.util.Set<V> vertices)
        Add all of the vertices to the graph without any edges. If the the graph already contains any one of the vertices, that vertex is not added.
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to be mutated
        vertices - vertices to add

      • addOutgoingEdges

        public static <V> void addOutgoingEdges(org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<V,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> graph,
                        V source,
                        java.util.Set<V> targets)
        Add dependencies to the given source vertex. Whether duplicates are created is dependent on the underlying DirectedGraph implementation.
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to be mutated
        source - source vertex of the new edges
        targets - target vertices for the new edges

      • addIncomingEdges

                        N target,
                        java.util.Set<N> sources)
        Add dependents on the give target vertex. Whether duplicates are created is dependent on the underlying DirectedGraph implementation.
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to be mutated
        target - target vertex for the new edges
        sources - source vertices for the new edges

                                       V target)
        Fetch all of the dependents of the given target vertex
        Returns:
        mutable snapshot of the source vertices of all incoming edges

        Fetch all of the dependencies of the given source vertex

        Find the leave vertices in the graph. I.E. Vertices that have no outgoing edges
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to search
        Returns:
        mutable snapshot of all leaf vertices.
